posts.title: Luek Classics
posts.description: Luek Classics is a motor company dealing with classic cars.They buy written off vehicles and reestablish them to be fit to hit the roads. For more info visit their website

posts.title: Luek Trucks
posts.description: Luek Trucks deals with vintage off-road trucks.the trucks are tuned to be able to operate in extreme terrains without struggle.The trucks range forn 10000USD to 50000USD.Visit their website for more info.

posts.title: Luek Luxury
posts.description: Luek Luxury deals with cool luxury cars.they are new cars with zero milage allin good condition anad running well on roads
